name: One Way Hero-LD38
description:
Join your stalwart hero on an endless eastward quest. Fight enemies! Donate to panhandlers! Overcome the odds and achieve the greatest distance possible.

Created by Flippfly:
Code: Allison Salmon ( @CodeCrafty )
